sourcesContent:
<template>
	<form @submit.prevent="submitForm">
		test
	</form>
</template>

<script>
import { set, get } from 'idb-keyval';

export default {
	name: 'VGInter',
	data() {
		return {
			vg_id: '',
			appartements: [
				//ajouter tous les champs
				{num: '', bat: '', etage: '', porte: '', suivi: ''},
			],
		};
	},
	mounted() {
		let uri = window.location.href.split('?');
		let vars = uri[1].split('&');
		let getVars = {};
		let tmp = '';
		vars.forEach(function(v) {
		tmp = v.split('=');
		if(tmp.length == 2)
			getVars[tmp[0]] = tmp[1];
		});
		let item_id = getVars.item_id;
		this.vg_occ = item_id;
		console.log(this.vg_id);
	},
  // beforeUnmount() {
  //   window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', this.saveFormData);
  // },
  methods: {
    async saveFormData(occ) {
		occ = occ+1;
		//Data from table + form
		var result = this.$data;
		//To avoid cloning error
		result = JSON.stringify(result);
		var test = JSON.parse(result);
		console.log("occ : "+occ);
		if (isNaN(occ)) {
			let i = 0;
			while(await get('VG-xxx-'+i)) {
				await set('VG-xxx-'+i, test.appartements[i-1]);
				console.log("test");
				i = i + 1;
			}
		} else {
			await set('VG-xxx-'+occ, test.appartements[occ-1]);
		}
    },
    async getFormData() {
		let i = 1;
		let data = [];
		if(await get('VG-xxx-'+i) !== undefined) {
			while(await get('VG-xxx-'+i) !== undefined) {
				let savedData = await get('VG-xxx-'+i);
				data[i-1] = savedData;
				i = i + 1;
			}
			this.appartements = data;
		}
    },
    addItem() {
		//mettre type en arg
		// this['inter_'+type].push({ name: "", email: ""});
		let nbr_line = document.querySelectorAll('.vg-line').length + 1;
		set('VG-xxx-'+nbr_line, {num: '', bat: '', etage: '', porte: '', suivi: ''});
		this.saveFormData();
    },
    removeItem(index, type) {
		this['inter_'+type].splice(index, 1);
		this.saveFormData();
    },
    submitForm() {
      this.getFormData();
    },
  },
};
</script>
